General.Name: Delticom AG
General.Description: Delticom AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in online distribution of tires and wheels in Europe. The company sells its tires to retail and commercial customers for passenger cars, motorbikes, trucks, utility vehicles, buses, and wheel sets. It operates online shops and online distribution platforms in various countries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hanover, Germany.

2.Name: Mr. Alexander  Eichler
2.Title: COO & Member of the Management Board

4.Name: Dr. Johannes Georg  Schmidt-Schultes
4.Title: Group CFO & Member of the Management Board
